channel.title: How to use custom samples with wave/flashplay?
channel.description:
Hello,
This is driving me nuts : I need to play a sample from the sd card but would like to load it in sdram instead of streaming it. Said otherwise I'd like to use wave/flashplay instead of wave/play_fn (I have SD card issues I'd like to troubleshoot)
How can I play something else than the default 808 samples ?
Thank you in advance!

item.title: How to use custom samples with wave/flashplay?
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Default 808 samples are included in the firmware and can't be replaced. You can however load your samples in a table. More info in this topic:

Triggering WAV-Samples via different MIDI notes

allocate a table though "table/alloc 16b sdram"
load a sample (from sdCARD) into that table with "table/load", both allocation and loading at startup are integrated in the "table/alloc 16b sdram load" object
play it with the "table/play" object, referencing the relevant "table/alloc..." object.

Read full topic
item.source: How to use custom samples with wave/flashplay?
